title: Enhancing EFL Learning and Training Reflective Thinking on Cultural Comparison through Computer-Mediated Communication

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Conversational Skills and Elementary Education Experience
context.additional_context: Asynchronous online learning combining cultural reflective thinking for elementary school teachers to strengthen English instruction competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three English communication strategies that reflect similarities/differences between Anglophone cultural elements and their own culture.
Learners achieve over 80% participation in English writing tasks applying culturally reflective thinking in LMS-based asynchronous discussions.
Learners include cultural reflection elements in over 70% of reflective essays written based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
